name: Merge Atoms - Atomic Curling
description:
Atomic curling is a merger game about atoms. Do you love chemistry? Well, you should try to play at the Atomic curling.
You should merge two same elements in the next one in the periodic table.
The gameplay is really simple, it’s a mash-up of popular merge games and curling games.
You should push atoms and put same atoms closer to each other. Two same molecules merge if they are close enough. So, your aim is combining chemical elements with the biggest atomic number.
You can play without an Internet connection.
This interesting game is almost free!
